text: Roberto Mauro de Oliveira (born April 12, 1941), is a former Brazilian soccer player who played in the NASL. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Washington Whips |1968 |NASL |10||4||0||0||0||0||10||4 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !10!!4!!0!!0!!0!!0!!10!!4 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:América Futebol Clube (MG) players Category:Bangu Atlético Clube players Category:Clube Atlético Mineiro players Category:Washington Whips players Category:Villa Nova Atlético Clube players Category:North American Soccer League (1968–1984) players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:1941 births
title: Roberto Mauro
